name: MacroIndicator
doc: Time series data for macroeconomic indicators from RBI, MOSPI, and other sources

fields.name: indicator_date
fields.doc: Date of the indicator observation (ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DD)

fields.name: indicator_code
fields.doc: Unique code identifying the indicator (e.g., REPO_RATE, CPI_COMBINED, WPI_ALL, FX_RESERVES)

fields.name: indicator_category
fields.doc: Category of indicator (POLICY_RATE, INFLATION, FX_RESERVE, GDP, EMPLOYMENT)

fields.name: unit
fields.doc: Unit of measurement (%, INR Crore, USD Million, Index Points, etc.)

fields.name: frequency
fields.doc: Frequency of data (DAILY, WEEKLY, MONTHLY, QUARTERLY, ANNUAL)

fields.name: ingestion_timestamp
fields.doc: Timestamp when data was ingested (ISO 8601 format)
